name: custom-files
description: A way to customize the look of your files in Atom Editor. Right click a file or folder to customize it.
readme:
# custom-files

A way to customize the way your files look in Atom.
Right click any file or folder and select 'customize' to begin.

Currently supports:
* Changing the icon to an svg, png, jpeg, font
* Changing the background color
* Changing the text color
* Adding a colored highlight (seperate of git highlight)
* Adding a background image
* Adding an alias
